description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A creature that has blood and is not at its maximum Hit Points hits you with a melee Strike

Effect You channel salt and brine from your blood into the creature's wounds. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. On a failure, the creature takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,acid]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} by the pain. On a critical failure, it instead takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,acid]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
